# Plots
## South
### Plots

```{r C07}

C07M <- C07 %>%
  # mutate(x = x 
  #        y = y / 1000) %>%
  filter(sample_mode=="map",
         mg_ca<0.6) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x/ 1000,
      y/ 1000,
      col = mg_ca) +
  geom_point(size = 1,show.legend = FALSE) +
  scale_color_viridis(option = "G",
                      begin = 0,
                      end = 0.95) +
  geom_path(data = C07 %>% filter(sample_mode=="trace"),
            aes(x = x/ 1000, y = y/ 1000),
            col = "red",
            linetype="dashed",
            size=0.7)+
  coord_fixed()+  
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(15,14,13),trans = "reverse")+
    ylab("y-axis [mm]")+ggtitle("C7")+
  xlab("x-axis [mm]")+labs(col = "Mg/Ca [a.u.]")



C07T <- C07 %>%
  filter(sample_mode == "trace") %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(dist,
      mg_ca,
      col = mg_ca) +
  geom_path(show.legend=FALSE,size=1) +
  scale_color_viridis(option = "G",
                      begin = 0.5,
                      end = 0.95) +
  ylab("Mg/Ca [a.u.]") +
  xlab("Distance to edge [mm]")

  

C07M/C07T+plot_annotation(
                          # title="C07",
                          # subtitle="Map and Linescan",
                          tag_levels = "A"
                          )


ggsave(here("figures","C07.png"), width = 15, height = 20, units = "cm")


```

## Full maps
```{r}

Specimen <- LIBS %>% pull(specimen) %>% unique()

for(i in Specimen) {
  
  plot <- LIBS %>% 
    filter(sample_mode == "map",
           mg_ca < 0.6,
           specimen == i) %>% 
    ggplot() +
    aes(x/1000, y/1000, col = mg_ca) +
    geom_point(size = 1, show.legend = TRUE) +
    scale_color_viridis(option = "G", begin = 0, end = 0.95) +
    coord_fixed() +
    ylab("y-axis [mm]") + 
    ggtitle(paste(i)) +
    xlab("x-axis [mm]") +
    labs(col = "Mg/Ca [a.u.]")
  
  
    ggsave(filename = here("Plots",paste0("Full map of ",i, ".png")), plot = plot)

}




```
